name: blog/gravity-start-webinar
content:
blocks:
  - type: blog-header-block
    resetPaddings: true
    paddingBottom: l
    width: m
    verticalOffset: m

    background:
      image:
        src: >-
          https://storage.yandexcloud.net/gravity-landing-static/blog/blog-cover-bg.png

      color: '#CCDAFF'
      fullWidth: false
  - type: blog-layout-block
    resetPaddings: true
    mobileOrder: reverse
    children:
      - type: blog-yfm-block
        column: left
        resetPaddings: true
        text: >
          Vladimir Timofeev (Product Owner gravity-ui.com) vai contar por onde
          comeÃ§ar a conhecer o Gravity UI, mostrar os elementos principais e

      - type: blog-media-block

        videoIframe: https://runtime.strm.yandex.ru/player/episode/vpleycdol66bubppvqg7

author: timofeyevvv
